posts.name: DNarendran
posts.cooked:
@s.anand sir, @Amit1 and @carlton , could you please tell the maximum marks can one get as bonus marks and what are the mini projects which are considered for the same.

Regards D Narendran

posts.name: DNarendran
posts.cooked:
1. Election time series
  2. Discourse badge analysis
  3. Week 1 to 5 which is easy
  4. Do 5 peer review
  5. Claudia
  6. Instagram

If i have left something please update

posts.name: DNarendran
posts.cooked:
Every one got 2 marks as bonus.
@s.anand sir, @Amit1 and @carlton , sorry to disturb you, but please calrify the rational behind the allotment of bonus marks.

posts.name: Anupam Chandra
posts.cooked: That doesn’t sound right. Only those people who attempted the bonus assignments should get the bonus marks. I guess there has been some mistake from the Support team’s side OR we are getting 2 more marks on top of the bonus assignment marks, which haven’t been updated yet

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked:
2 marks is a bonus normalisation for all the pain everyone suffered due to various operational issues for everyone (courtesy of operations). This covers any peer review pain as well.

Kind regards TDS

posts.name: Anupam Chandra
posts.cooked: Thanks for the clarification @carlton. What about the bonus assignment marks? I have spent more than 30-40 hours on those. I should get an additional 1.9 marks for the bonus assignments.

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked: The final bonus has not been pushed. You will get the additional bonus when the final T score evaluation is done.
